name: sm00sh for Sociable
author: Lopo Lencastre de Almeida

sections.description:
Allow your readers to convert your post permalink to a shorten sm00shed one and include it in their’s favorite social or blog site. WordPress 2.6 or above and Sociable 3.4.1 or above is required, if you use an older version of those, please upgrade.

More info:

  • More info on Sociable, with info on how to add sites to it, and how to integrate it into your WordPress in other ways.
  • Check out the other WordPress plugins by the same author.
sections.installation:
This assumes you already have Sociable installed and configured.

Install

  1. Unzip the sm00sh4sociable.zip file.
  2. Upload the the sm00sh4sociable folder (not just the files in it!) to your wp-contents/plugins folder. If you’re using FTP, use ‘binary’ mode.

Activate

  1. In your WordPress administration, go to the Plugins page
  2. Activate the sm00sh for Sociable plugin
  3. Configure it at the subpage for Sociable in your Options menu.

If you find any bugs or have any ideas, please mail me.

Advanced Users

For advanced use of the plugin, see the Sociable page on Yoast
